employee_external_id.notes: Maps to ADP Associate OID path parameter. Direct string mapping with validation against ADP requirements.

absence_type_external_id.notes: Maps to ADP leave type code in request body. Verify allowed values via meta endpoints for compatibility.

status.notes: Direct mapping to ADP status property. Confirm allowed values (approved, pending) from schema to avoid mismatches.

start_date.notes: Maps to ADP startDateTime field. Requires date-time format conversion (YYYY-MM-DD to ISO 8601 date-time).

end_date.notes: Maps to ADP returnDateTime field. Requires date-time format conversion and separate return request endpoint.

start_half_day.notes: ADP schema doesn't support half-day flags. Store as annotation in description field or use fractional days if supported.

end_half_day.notes: ADP schema doesn't support half-day flags. Store as annotation in description field or use fractional days if supported.

amount.notes: Maps to ADP days property. Assumes days unit - if hours needed, store in description or use custom fields.

unit.notes: ADP days property implies days unit. If other units needed, store in description field or use custom fields.

employee_note.notes: Maps to ADP description property. Ensure character limits align with ADP schema constraints.

mapping_summary.mapping_complexity: Medium - requires date format conversion and logical handling for half-day flags

processing_context: ADP Enterprise HR Leave of Absence API - requires separate endpoints for leave creation and return requests, with date-time format conversions and logical handling for half-day granularity
recommendations: Verify allowed leave type codes via meta endpoints before mapping
